name: KGH Global Consulting AB
goal: KGH Global Consulting is an independent consultancy company within the KGH Group, assisting government agencies and businesses all over the world with Customs capacity building and implementation of modernized Border Management. With more than 700 Customs experts and a global network of partners, we offer state-of-the-art solutions based on global best practices and international standards.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Customs, Education and training, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Fraud prevention, International co-operation and development, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
EU Funded Development Projects
BREXIT
IT Initiatives
Risk Management
Customs/Border Management
Trade Facilitation
UCC-implementation
customers: Policy Department on Citizens' Rights and Constitutional Affairs
